title: Projects
description: A list of the things I have done. With some extra long text. I have been an software engineer at Apple since 2016. During that time, I have been developing software features for the Apple Watch and learning about onâ€“device personalization and machine learning. Most recently I have joined the Machine Intelligence team continue to pursue on-device machine learning. For watchOS 7 we worked to create an experience for interactive Handwashing tracking helping people to stay healthy.
